creator.description:
Moderation services for progressive weebs who believe no one should face stigma or harassment for enjoying or creating controversial fiction, mainly anime, manga, games, hentai, fan art, and doujin works.

Read more at moderation.moe/about

locales.description: User who has expressed a wish that those who enjoy, defend, or create controversial fiction not interact with them.
locales.name: Do not interact üöß

locales.description: User who has expressed a belief in the "danger" or "immorality" of controversial fiction or those who enjoy, defend, or create such works.
locales.name: Anti ‚ò£Ô∏è

locales.description:
User who has acted in a hostile manner towards those who enjoy, defend, or create controversial fiction.

Hostile actions include a) committing, b) expressing a willingness to commit, or c) expressing approval of others committing any of the following acts:

1) Stigmatize or call out.
2) Harass.
3) Keyword search to argue.
4) List or label in a way that implies a "danger."
5) Campaign to censor works or deplatform.

This label is intended for unprovoked hostility. If the transgressor was provoked this label requires a much higher burden of proof.

‚ö†Ô∏è We recommend you use our block list of the same name to avoid harassment, shaming, or drama.
locales.name: Hostile üí¢

locales.description: User has expressed overt anti-progressive sentiments or reactionary politics while defending or visibly enjoying controversial fiction.

locales.description: User has without provocation repeatedly harassed those with negative views on controversial fiction.
